text: Acanthepeira is a genus of orb-weaver spiders first described by George Marx in 1883. ==Species== it contains five species: *Acanthepeira cherokee Levi, 1976 – USA *Acanthepeira labidura (Mello-Leitão, 1943) – Brazil *Acanthepeira marion Levi, 1976 – USA, Mexico *Acanthepeira stellata (Walckenaer, 1805) – Canada to Mexico *Acanthepeira venusta (Banks, 1896) – USA, Cuba, Hispaniola ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Brazil Category:Spiders of North America
title: Acanthepeira
